content: **this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf** there is now a matching scarf find it over here 1 french language translation has been added to the download **materials needed ** 3 75 mm f hook or hook needed to obtain gauge for 3-6 mos and 9-12 mos 4mm g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge for 6-9 mos toddler child and adult sizes approximately 100-200 yards of #4 worsted weight red heart super saver yarn depending on the size chosen yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors optional pom-pom maker **stitches used ** single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet decrease = single_crochet 2 together **gauge ** 14 half_double_crochet in 4 using a 4mm hook 15 half_double_crochet in 4 using 3 75mm hook **additional terms ** *shell * 5 double_crochet in designated stitch *stitching in the 3rd loop of half_double_crochet * look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back and you should see another v made by the yarn over you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is the yarn over and is called the 3rd loop st/sts = stitch/stitches skip = skip prev = previous 1 https //www kirstenhollowaydesigns com/la-vie-en-rose-free-ladies-crochet-scarf-pattern/
